thread.section_title: Stock Market & Finance News - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: JPMorgan CFO Emerges as Contender to Succeed Dimon

author: Emily Glazer
title: JPMorgan CFO Emerges as Contender to Succeed Dimon

organizations.name: jpmorgan cfo emerges as contender to succeed dimon when jpmorgan chase & co.

text:
When JPMorgan Chase & Co. tried last month to clarify the question of when Chairman and Chief Executive James Dimon would step down, the firm got a lot more questions about who could fill one of the most powerful roles on Wall Street.
One of the most intriguing: What about Marianne Lake?
JPMorganâ€™s 48-year-old chief financial officer,...
